trans-unit.source: Stores an ordered pair of integers, which specify a <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Height" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Width" />.
trans-unit.target: Armazena um par ordenado de inteiros, que especificam um <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Height" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Width" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size> class is used to specify a height and width through the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A> property for <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>, <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> and other graphics classes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Size> classe é usada para especificar uma altura e largura por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>, <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> e outras classes de elementos gráficos.

trans-unit.source: You can perform operations on a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> by using the overloaded operators such as <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode executar operações em um <xref:System.Drawing.Size> usando os operadores sobrecarregados como <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A>, e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The unit for the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> structure depend on the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is used to draw.
trans-unit.target: A unidade para o <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> do <xref:System.Drawing.Size> estrutura dependem de <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> configurações para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto que é usado para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure from the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> do <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure from which to initialize this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> da qual inicializar esta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure from the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: The width component of the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: O componente de largura do novo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: The height component of the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: O componente de altura do novo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure from the specified dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> das dimensões especificadas.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.%23ctor%2A> constructors and the <xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.%23ctor%2A> construtores e <xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeração.

trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, cole este código em um formulário do Windows que contenha um rótulo chamado `Label1` e chamar o `IntializeLabel1` método no construtor do formulário.

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `AddSizes` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure to convert.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> a ser convertida.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure by rounding the values of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure to the next higher integer values.
trans-unit.target: Converte a estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> especificada em uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />, arredondando os valores da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> para os próximos valores inteiros mais altos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure this method converts to.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> para a qual esse método converte.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure that has a <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Height" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Width" /> value of 0.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que tem um valor <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Height" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Width" /> de 0.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> a ser testado.

trans-unit.source: Tests to see whether the specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure with the same dimensions as this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Testa para verificar se o objeto especificado é uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> com as mesmas dimensões dessa estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> and has the same width and height as this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="obj" /> for um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> e tiver a mesma largura e altura desse <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that specifies a hash value for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro que especifica um valor de hash para esta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: You should avoid depending on <xref:System.Drawing.Size.GetHashCode%2A> for unique values, as two <xref:System.Drawing.Size> objects with the same values for their <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> properties may return the same hash code.
trans-unit.target: Você deve evitar dependendo <xref:System.Drawing.Size.GetHashCode%2A> de valores exclusivos, como dois <xref:System.Drawing.Size> objetos com os mesmos valores para seus <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> propriedades podem retornar o mesmo código de hash.

trans-unit.source: This behavior could change in a future release.
trans-unit.target: Esse comportamento foi alterado em uma versão futura.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical component of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o componente vertical desta estrutura de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: The vertical component of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure, typically measured in pixels.
trans-unit.target: O componente vertical desta estrutura de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />, geralmente medido em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The unit for the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> structure depend on the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is used to draw.
trans-unit.target: A unidade para o <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> do <xref:System.Drawing.Size> estrutura dependem de <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> configurações para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto que é usado para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure has width and height of 0.
trans-unit.target: Testa se essa estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> tem a altura e largura de 0.

trans-unit.source: This property returns <see langword="true" /> when this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure has both a width and height of 0; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade retorna <see langword="true" /> quando essa estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> tem a largura e a altura de 0; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="sz1" /> and <paramref name="sz2" /> have equal width and height; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="sz1" /> e <paramref name="sz2" /> tiverem a mesma largura e altura; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure to convert.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> a ser convertida.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure by truncating the values of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure to the next lower integer values.
trans-unit.target: Converte a estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> especificada em uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />, truncando os valores da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> para os próximos valores inteiros mais baixos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure this method converts to.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> para a qual esse método converte.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use static <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Round%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Truncate%2A> methods to convert a <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Size>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar estático <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Round%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Truncate%2A> métodos para converter um <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> para um <xref:System.Drawing.Size>.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para ser usado com o Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a form that contains two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> objects named `Label1` and `Label2`, and then call this method from the form's constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, cole-o em um formulário que contém duas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> objetos nomeados `Label1` e `Label2`e, em seguida, chamar este método de construtor do formulário.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal component of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o componente horizontal desta estrutura de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal component of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure, typically measured in pixels.
trans-unit.target: O componente horizontal desta estrutura de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />, geralmente medido em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The unit for the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> structure depend on the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object used to draw.
trans-unit.target: A unidade para o <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> do <xref:System.Drawing.Size> estrutura dependem de <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> configurações para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto usado para desenhar.
